dialogues.text:
Analyzing environment...
Impact zone: cave network.
Similar to rock formations from your planet.

Mmm... You have functional logs, but nothing
about the expeditions. Something doesn't add up.

Go through your initial protocols.
Analyze, study, and understand everything you
see. I need you to be back to full functionality.

Kinetic Sphere handled correctly.
Strategic use of the ability beyond movement 
is recommended.

This isn't the first time I've almost been buried
alive... Believe me, I know its potential.

Remember: after using an ability, the system
needs to recharge before a new use.
The suitâ€™s charge status is visible on your interface.

Yeah, that icon. When we get back, I'll ask them
to change it. Sometimes, the way it looks, it gives
me the impression that I've broken something.
